Class CustomerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.petropavlovskaja.pharmacy.service.CustomerService

extends java.lang.Object
    Class for services of customer role. Uses RecipeService, CommonService, AccountDAO, MedicineDAO and OrderDAO
